interactivity.requirements: 20 Ami Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " See You in the Morning " Seen " FLAVOR BEAM! " from Maya Makinami

progression.synopsis: Ami would like Sensei to take her shopping. She also wants Sensei to pay, since she doesn't have a job. Sensei suggests that she get one, and although Ami points out that cooking and cleaning for Sensei practically is her job, she considers the possibility. When he suggests the maid cafe he visited with Maya , Ami becomes suspicious that he's become addicted and is spending all his money there. If so, she wants to work there so she can keep an eye on him (and collect his money). She asks him to go with her to the maid cafe sometime to ask about a job.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.10p2.
